mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.parent_id as "parentId", a.parent_ids as "parentIds", a.level as "level", a.leaf as "leaf", a.name as "name", a.type as "type", a.href as "href", a.component as "component", a.icon as "icon", a.sort as "sort", a.permission as "permission", a.target as "target", a.hide as "hide", a.del_flag as "delFlag", a.create_by as "createBy", a.createTime as "createTime", a.update_by as "updateBy", a.updateTime as "updateTime"
